name: VBOX7 [ minimalistic ] [ no ads ]
description:
A style by toxdox.net and thesimplecomplex.co.uk.
A minimalistic design for the N2 popular website in Bulgaria. Its purpose -sharing video.
No advertisement is shown.
Refreshed design.
Key modifications:
- index
- video page
- search / listing page
- login
- profile
- settings
- charts

For more detailed screenshots visit http://en.toxdox.net/publication/2009/7/user-styles#vbox7
